title: Ep. 408 - Another Media Narrative Falls Apart
description:
Last week a story went viral about a girl getting expelled from a Christian school solely for having a rainbow cake on her birthday. Lots of people took that version at face value. Turns out, unsurprisingly, there's a lot more to the story. When will people stop being so easily fooled by fake news? Also, the Women's March has faded into irrelevance while the March For Life continues going strong after four decades. We'll look at the difference between those two movements.

If you like The Matt Walsh Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: WALSH and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at dailywire.com/Walsh
